name: Fairmont Felted Bowls
description: Using just one Woolstok bundle, this quick knit set of mini hanks will create two adorable little bowls. Knit with 2 strands held together and felted. Just the right size to hold your keys, snacks or small knitting notions.
full_text: Using just one Woolstok bundle, this quick knit set of mini hanks will create two adorable little bowls. Knit with 2 strands held together and felted. Just the right size to hold your keys, snacks or small knitting notions. EXPERIENCE Advanced Beginner MATERIALS Woolstok Bundle (100% Fine Highland Wool; 5g/12yds): 12 mini hanks Size 13 (9mm) DPNs, or size to obtain gauge FINISHED MEASUREMENTS Circumference: 12” (14”) Height: 2” (2 1/2”) COLOR SHOWN Woolstok Neutral Bundle No. 1303K Woolstok Cool Bundle No. 1304K
